name: Trinity Vine Earrings
description:
Inspired by own backyard, the rolling hills of Berks County, PA. The tulip vine was a popular motif in Pennsylvania Dutch folk art, commonly found on tin trays and the front of cedar chests. This simplified design is a classic example of “folk art” -  art made by an untrained  person purely for personal decorative purpose. The stylized tulip trinity represents faith in yourself, faith in what you do, and faith in your fellowman. (check out the matching necklace ... )

These are 100% sterling silver with sterling ear wires  - original designs and hand cut from a 20 gauge sheet. They are approximately 3" long and 1/2" at their widest point.  

Each set is custom made for you, please allow 1-2 weeks for delivery.  

Thanks for looking!

name: Trinity Vine Necklace
description:
Inspired by my own backyard, the rolling hills of Berks County, PA. The tulip vine was a popular motif in Pennsylvania Dutch folk art, commonly found on tin trays and the front of cedar chests. This simplified design is a classic example of “folk art” -  art made by an untrained  person purely for personal decorative purpose. The stylized tulip trinity represents faith in yourself, faith in what you do, and faith in your fellowman. (check out the matching earrings!)

100 % sterling silver on a 20" sterling snake chain - original Skylark Studio design, hand cut from 20 gauge sterling sheet (about the thickness of a quarter).  The pendant is approximately 3" long and 1/2" wide. 

Thanks for looking!

name: Hex Heart & Tulip Necklace
description:
Inspired by my own backyard, the rolling hills of Berks County, PA. Hearts and tulips are common motifs in Pennsylvania Dutch folk art. Taking from the decorating history of their ancestral Germans, the immigrant PA Dutch (or Deutsch) made the most of their humble surrounding and stripped the design down to the basics - the heart symbolizing love and the tulip meaning faith. What else do you really need?

100% sterling silver with a 20" sterling box chain - an original Skylark Studio design, hand cut from 20 gauge sterling sheet (about the thickness of a quarter).  The heart pendant is approx. 1 1/2" across and 1 3/4" long. 

Custom made for you, please allow 1-2 weeks delivery. I ship Priority USPS with insurance. 

Thanks for looking!

Taken from the decorating history of their ancestral Germans, the immigrant PA Dutch (or Deutsch) made the most of their humble surrounding and stripped the design down to the basics - the heart symbolizing love and the tulip meaning faith. 100% sterling silver with sterling ear wires - an original Skylark Studio design, hand cut from 20 gauge sterling sheet (about the thickness of a quarter).  The heart is approx. 1 1/2" across and 1 3/4" long.  Side hoops dangle about 2 1/2" down from the ear.

name: Hex Hoops
description:
From the heartlands of the Pennsylvania Dutch, these hex signs or barn stars are a reminder of the German settlers in Pennsylvania. Once thought to ward off evil, hex signs are more likely “chust for nice” as the PA Dutch say. The scalloped edges are for smooth sailing and the star represents success.

100% sterling silver with sterling ear wires - an original Skylark Studio design, hand cut from 20 gauge sterling sheet (about the thickness of a quarter).   These are extra large in size, approximately 2 1/2" in diameter. 

Custom made for you, please allow 1-2 weeks delivery. I ship Priority USPS with insurance. 

Thanks for looking!
